column1: Visitation will be Sunday from 6:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m.
column3: Tuesday 9:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m CDT.    Services will be Tuesday
column5: at 2:00 p.m. CDT in the funeral home chapel with Bro. Doyle Ashburn and Dale Angel officiating. Burial will be in Iron Hill Cemetery. Online condolences can be made at www.reedfamilyfh.com. Arrangements by Putnam-Reed Funeral Home
